137.title: Angel Sanctuary. v. 1

(Viz Graphic Novel)
"This book reads from right to left."
First published in Japan in 1995 by Hakusensha, Inc.
"Rated T+ for older teens."

Summary: "Why is Setsuna so mixed up? Despite his attempts to be noble, he'll fight anyone anytime; he ignores all authority; and he harbors feelings for his sister that can only be describes as "incestuous." Why is he such a mess? The reason may be found with two demons from the underworld and their enemy, an insane angel who is distributing an insidious computer game called Angel Sanctuary."

138.title: Angel Sanctuary. v. 2
138.author: story and art by Kaori Yuki.
notes: Shôjo ed.
(Viz Graphic Novel)
This book reads from right to left.
Rated T+ for older teens.

Summary: "The most insane creatures in the nine planes of heaven and nine planes of hell are all telling messed-up teenager Setsuna that he is the reincarnation of an angel. That wouldn't be so bad except that some of these beings are trying to kill him, and others want him to lead them in a revolt against God! All Setsuna wants to do is keep a sister he loves away from the dangerous creatures who are trying to harm her. Unfortunately some of the worst harm can come from Setsuna's love, which threatens to bloom into full-blown incest! How can Setsuna protect his sister from himself?"

151.heading: Angela, Sister.
151.title: Hungry for Victory
151.author: story and art by Rumiko Takahashi.
notes: (Viz Graphic Novel)
(One-Pound Gospel)

"Although he's constantly waging war against his appetite, pro boxer Kosaku never met a meal he didn't like! Naturally, this plays havoc with his weight class. Can the faith of a pretty novice nun Sister Angela redeem the gluttonous appetite of the tempted lamb astride the scale?"
"This volume contains the One-Pound Gospel installments from Animerica vol. 3, no. 10 through vol. 4, no. 1 and the One Pound Gospel series monthly series #1 through #4 in their entirety."

184.title: Angelic Layer
184.author: Clamp.
notes: Complete in 5 vols.

185.title: Angelic Layer. Battle 5
185.author: Clamp ; translator, Anita Sengupta ; English adaptation, Jamie S
notes: Summary: "The Fujisaki sisters are back! Misaki Suzuhara, rising star on the Angelic Layer scene, has already bested the older sister, but now she must face Arisu, a mechanical genius with one thing on her mind, revenge. For this long-awaited grudge match an all-new layer is unveiled, a winter wonderland that can freeze an unsuspecting angel. Can Misaki's warm heart melt this cold competition and get her to the final battle? The battles get personal in the final volume of Angelic Layer. Fight on, Misaki!"
Originally published in Japanese by Kadokawa Shoten in 2001.

188.heading: Angelica.
188.title: Junk, Sweet Junk
188.author: by Molly Wigand ; illustrated by Barry Goldberg.
notes: (Ready-to-Read)

Summary (from OCLC): Tommy, Chuckie, and Angelica help Tommy's grandfather throw away the useless junk he has accumulated, but the children find new uses for most of it and Grandpa decides it has value after all. Based on the animated television show Rugrats.

197.title: Anesthesia
notes: In the third story in the Spanish erotic album Naughty Escapades, a dentist is shown using sexual activity as an anesthetic. See also Ether.
